reset.title: Reset All Settings
reset.desc: Reset all settings to default values

clear.title: Clear All Data
clear.desc: Clear all chat and settings data
clear.confirm: Confirm clear all chat and settings data?

inputTemplate.title: User Input Template
inputTemplate.desc: The latest user message will be filled into this template

compressThreshold.title: History Message Length Compression Threshold
compressThreshold.desc: When the uncompressed history message exceeds this value, it will be compressed

historyCount.title: Number of History Messages
historyCount.desc: Number of history messages carried in each request

maxTokens.title: Max Tokens per Response
maxTokens.desc: The maximum number of tokens used for each interaction

temperature.title: Randomness (temperature)
temperature.desc: The higher the value, the more random the response

topP.title: Nucleus Sampling (top_p)
topP.desc: Similar to randomness, but do not change it together with randomness

presencePenalty.title: Topic Freshness (presence_penalty)
presencePenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to expand to new topics

frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty (frequency_penalty)
frequencyPenalty.desc: The higher the value, the more likely it is to reduce repeated words

token.title: API Key
token.desc: Use your own key to bypass password access restrictions

endpoint.title: API Endpoint
endpoint.desc: In addition to the default address, it must include http(s)://

accessCode.title: Access Code
accessCode.desc: Encryption access has been enabled by the administrator
